name: Ryder Horne Design
description: Ryder Horne Design is an agency which makes brilliant web design ideas easy to accomplish.

hero.title: Web design is hard. We make it easy.
hero.description: At Ryder Horne Design, our agency works hard to make sure your digital presence is the best in your local industry. From web design to search engine optimization, we offer many services to make sure you will be successful in your online endeavors.

alt: Ryder Horne Design logo, containing a blue to green gradient with coding brackets in the middle.

services.title: Our services
services.description: We offer a variety of services to help you build your digital presence and make sure you're as successful as possible.
services.alt: Three women smiling and looking at a MacBook Pro

portfolio.title: Our portfolio
portfolio.description: We want you to trust us. That is why we have collected the best of our work and compiled it for your viewing, making it easy for you to see what we're capable of.

contact.title: Interested in working with us?
contact.description: Contact us easily using our contact form, or the various methods listed on the page below.
contact.alt: Woman typing on a MacBook Pro

portfolio.name: Portfolio
portfolio.description: We have collected all of our best work to show you what we can do and show you that you can trust us.

sr.title: Sabercat Robotics
sr.description: Sabercat Robotics is a high school robotics program that teaches students many real-life skills, including programming, robotics, and engineering.

sis.title: Sisters in STEM
sis.description: Sabercat Robotics is a high school robotics program that teaches students many real-life skills, including programming, robotics, and engineering.

pcb.title: Petite Curio Boutique
pcb.description: Sabercat Robotics is a high school robotics program that teaches students many real-life skills, including programming, robotics, and engineering.

services.name: Services
services.description: Our agency offers many services to tailor to your needs.

contact.name: Contact Us
contact.description: We have various methods of contact to ensure you can easily reach out to us about anything.

form.title: Contact Form
form.description: Contact us about any questions or concerns you may have.

first.label: First name
first.description: Your first name, or the name you prefer to go by.
first.error: Your first name must be at least 2 characters long.

last.label: Last name
last.error: Your last name must be at least 2 characters long.

email.label: Email Address
email.description: The email address you want us to contact you at.
email.error: Your email address must be a valid email address.

country.label: Country
country.error: You must input a valid country.

website.label: Your Current Website
website.description: Your current website, if you have one.
website.error: Your website must be a valid URL.

business.label: Your Business
business.placeholder: Our business "Ryder Horne Design" is a web design and development agency that...
business.error: Your business description must be at least 8 characters long.

project.label: Your Project
project.placeholder: We are looking for a website that shows our creativity and our passion for design.
project.error: Your project description must be at least 8 characters long.

services.label: Services You're Interested In
services.description: Select all of the services you're interested in.
services.error: You must select at least one service.

pending.title: Sending...
pending.description: Our server is working on sending your message.

success.title: Thank you!
success.description: We've received your message and will be in touch soon.

error.title: Error
error.description: Something went wrong. Please try again.

other.title: Other Forms of Contact
other.description: If you have any other questions or concerns, please contact us using the methods listed below.

contact.x: Message us on X (previously Twitter) at @rhd_az

sitemap.name: Sitemap
sitemap.description: A list of every page on the Ryder Horne Design website.

404.name: Page Not Found
404.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.

error.name: Error Page
error.description: You have encountered an error on this page.
